text: I bought this product on May 5 th. In the place of a 1 year standard warranty it only had 10 days left for warranty to expire.I contacted hp mentioning this issue, they asked for the invoice and when I shared them the invoice they told me serial no. is not present in it. So I reported this to Amazon and they told me they will contact me in 6 days with new invoice. But they haven't contacted me yet and issue still persists. Read more
